Statute.Title: Criminal Code and to make related amendments to other Acts (medical assistance in dying), An Act to amend the
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Code criminel et apportant des modifications connexes à d’autres lois (aide médicale à mourir), Loi modifiant le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Justice and Minister of Health (s. 9.1)

General.Text: Independent Review, 2016, c. 3, s. 9.1(1) (no later than 14.12.2016) to initiate one or more independent reviews of issues relating to requests by mature minors for medical assistance in dying
Reports on review to be laid before each House of Parliament, 2016, c. 3, s. 9.1(2)
Review of Act, 2016, c. 3, s. 10 (at the start of the fifth year after 17.06.2016)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2016, c. 3, ss. 9.1 and 10 in force on assent 17.06.2016.
